<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/3/tv/{series_id}/similar"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint get similiar TV show to a TV show.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
